New Records: Dhananjaya de Silva reached an outstanding half-century of 66 off just 42 balls
Key Match Events: Rashid Khan took two wickets but his efforts were not enough to win the game
Charith Asalanka was dropped and caught
Najibullah Zadran was out caught by Hasaranga
Ibrahim Zadran was out caught by Bhanuka Rajapaksa
Mujeeb Ur Rahman took an early wicket of Pathum Nissanka
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan will exit the tournament with this loss and will find themselves looking back at the two washed-out games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan did not get much swing at the start of the inning
The match was played at the Brisbane Cricket Ground, Woolloongabba, Brisbane
Others: Sri Lanka won the match by 6 wickets
Afghanistan were restricted to 144/8 in 20 overs
Sri Lanka chased down the target of 144 in 19.3 overs
